results.overview: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.
results.title: Disclosure

results.overview: An investigation of how Hollywood's fabled stories have deeply influenced how Americans feel about transgender people, and how transgender people have been taught to feel about themselves.
results.title: Disclosure

results.overview: Australian documentary maker Emily, and her journalist husband, Danny, are reeling from an allegation of abuse their 4-year-old daughter Natasha has made against a local politician's 9-year-old son, Ethan. Ethan’s parents, Joel and Bek, arrive unannounced at Emily and Danny's house intent on convincing the couple that Natasha's allegation is a fabrication. Accusations, arguments, and the ultimate search for leverage turn their civil conversation into a vicious confrontation.
results.title: Disclosure

results.overview: A reporter discovers a woman who is a suspected terrorist.
results.title: Full Disclosure

results.overview: Would you have an affair with your boss? When a young real estate agent, Marc, celebrates his big sale over a nightcap with his married boss, Tom, he soon finds himself in dangerous waters. Leading them to question and push the boundaries of trust, monogamy, and open relationships. Can two men be faithful to each other? Can two men be honest with each other? Some say, No risk, no gain - both in real estate and relationships.
results.title: Night Disclosure

results.overview: Tyler realizes that it's time to talk to his partner about his HIV status, a revelation that takes them both on an emotional journey of heartache, isolation, and discrimination.
results.title: Disclosure

results.overview: An exploration concerning the act of revealing to a potential lover that one is seropositive to HIV, the virus believed to cause AIDS.
results.title: Fear of Disclosure

results.overview: A newcomer to a company climbs the corporate ladder very quickly, but pays a cost behind closed doors to get there.
results.title: Non-Disclosure

results.overview: Friends on a virtual drinks call are targeted by a supernatural Zoombomber, who forces them to reveal dark secrets. Hearts are broken, blood is spilled.
results.title: Full Disclosure

results.overview: The women have the power. Ben, who has Hollywood dreams, is faced with the choice to sign an agreement and keep silent about the boss's abuse - or end his career.
results.title: Non-Disclosure

results.overview: A young man meets his girlfriend for dinner and tries to discuss the elephant in the room, but a surprise turn of events distracts both of them.
results.title: Full Disclosure

results.overview: Everett reveals every terrible habit, attitude, and hang-up on the first date. Shockingly, women don't react as he'd hoped...until he meets Brinn, who's willing to play his game and try for Full Disclosure.
results.title: Full Disclosure

results.overview: Full Disclosure is a documentary short about secrets and the people they keep. Comprised of nine interviews with anonymous people shot in the summer of 2016, interviewees were asked to share one thing that had never spoken about with anyone.
results.title: Full Disclosure

results.overview: Two attractive female lawyers swap sexy and lurid tales (all stolen from other soft-core films) about their female clients while enjoying massages and a sauna.
results.title: Indecent Disclosure

results.overview: Our modern civilization is likely to be confronted with the biggest paradigm shift in the perception of reality ever, and through our productions we wish to bring insight from the forefront of this development.
results.title: The Day Before Disclosure

results.overview: Stephen Bassett, the only American lobbyist of his kind, hopes for a seismic shift with the 2016 US Presidential Elections. Bassett is on a mission to end the "truth embargo."
results.title: The Disclosure President

results.overview: Take a journey with us to discover who we are, where we are, why we are here, and where we are going. Learn about ages, races, civilizations, states of consciousness and more. The cosmic egg and calendar explains all 5 epoch cycles, and makes a bold prediction for the year 2020.
results.title: UNIversal DISClosure 2020

results.overview: Sun 29 Jun 2014 West Holts Stage Adding fuel to the flames Glastonbury will mark a year since Guy and Howard Lawrence's first album Settle hit the charts, which debuted at number 1 and gained nods from the Mercury Music Prize and a Grammy, plus a near perfect 9.1 score from Pitchfork. They joined Zane Lowe and B Traits at the festival last year, for a very special set on the BBC Introducing stage in Silver Hayes.  Collaborating with some of the most up-and-coming names, including Jessie Ware, Sam Smith and RnB legend Mary J Blige, the brothers inspired by Burial and Joy Orbison update late 90's two-step to create the soundtrack for this generation of ravers. Borrowing styles and voices from a variety of sources, Disclosure have the impressive knack of knowing what music we are going to love before we do. Emily Eavis promised this year would hold big things for them at Glasto, and a coveted slot on Worthy Farm seems sure to deliver.
results.title: Glastonbury 2014 Disclosure Live

results.original_title: Secrets From the Street: No Disclosure
results.overview: Secrets From the Street examines the intersection of cultures and classes as exemplified by the street life of San Francisco's Mission District. This videotape, produced for an exhibition held jointly at San Francisco's City Hall and its Museum of Modern Art, argues — against the show's theme and title, Public Disclosure: Secrets from the Street — that accounts of cultural life that omit the question of social power are mythical: The real "secret" is the obscured relation of economic and political domination exercised by one's own culture over the observed subculture. Or, as Rosler states in the tape's voiceover, "The secret is that to know the meaning of a culture you must know the limits of meaning of your own."
results.title: Secrets From the Street: No Disclosure
